data.name: Nash Racing 3: Drifter
data.detailed_description:
Game story:


Nash Racing 3 game you just hang and drift at different maps. Game is simulation style where you just tune your car, like changing body color, add stickers, change wheel color, glass color etc and different areas you can just drift and also use slow motion system with beautiful car. Also every map contains several
steam achievements. Player need use different driving skills to get achievements, there are also ramps which can used to get achievements

Features::

- 5 different themed maps
- Lot of steam achievements
- Tuning system: Change car color, change wheel colors, add stickers etc
- Drift at different tracks and hangaround in this car simulation

Planned updates::

- More maps
- More jumping. Adding more ramps to tracks where player can drift and make long jumps

data.short_description: Nash racing series is back. Tune your drifter car, drift and collect achievements in this car tuning simulation game and try to tame this beast and powerful car

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
